languages.text: "Как бы то ни было, Ваша Светлость, я благодарен вам и сестре Ардженте за свое спасение. Я надеюсь, что смогу как-нибудь отплатить вам за жалость, проявленную к покойнику. Но больше всего мое сердце греет то, что этот предатель, Комиссар, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}получил по заслугам{/d} и больше не будет отправлять отчаявшихся людей на смерть".

traits.locale_text: "Как бы то ни было, Ваша Светлость, я благодарен вам и сестре Ардженте за свое спасение. Я надеюсь, что смогу как-нибудь отплатить вам за жалость, проявленную к покойнику. Но больше всего мое сердце греет то, что этот предатель, Комиссар, получил по заслугам и больше не будет отправлять отчаявшихся людей на смерть".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."
languages.original_text: "Как бы то ни было, Ваша Светлость, я благодарен вам и сестре Ардженте за свое спасение. Я надеюсь, что смогу как-нибудь отплатить вам за жалость, проявленную к покойнику. Но больше всего мое сердце греет то, что этот предатель, Комиссар, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}получил по заслугам{/d} и больше не будет отправлять отчаявшихся людей на смерть".

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a dead man. What warms my hearth the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, got what he deserved and will not be sending any more desperate people to their death."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

What warms my hearth the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, got what he deserved and will not be sending any more desperate people to their death."

What warms my hearth the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, got what he deserved and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a dead man walking. What warms my hearth the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, got what he deserved and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「陛下、いずれにしても、私の命を救ってくださったあなたとシスター・アルジェンタには感謝しています。生ける死人を哀れんでくれたあなたに、いつか恩返しがしたい。ですが一番嬉しいのは、あの裏切り者のコミッサーが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}相応な罰{/d}を受け、これ以上絶望の淵にある人々を死に追いやることはないということです」
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、いずれにしても、私の命を救ってくださったあなたとシスター・アルジェンタには感謝しています。生ける死人を哀れんでくれたあなたに、いつか恩返しがしたい。ですが一番嬉しいのは、あの裏切り者のコミッサーが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}相応な罰{/d}を受け、これ以上絶望の淵にある人々を死に追いやることはないということです」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “无论如何，大人，我很感激您和阿洁塔修女救了我一命。希望有朝一日，我能报答您的救命之恩。不过，最让我感到开心的事情，是政委那个叛徒已经{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}得到了应得的惩罚{/d}，他再也没办法把那些走投无路的人送上屠宰场了。”
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: “无论如何，大人，我很感激您和阿洁塔修女救了我一命。希望有朝一日，我能报答您的救命之恩。不过，最让我感到开心的事情，是政委那个叛徒已经得到了应得的惩罚，他再也没办法把那些走投无路的人送上屠宰场了。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «En cualquier caso, les estoy agradecido a usted y a la Hermana Argenta por salvarme la vida. Espero poder recompensarles algún día por apiadarse de alguien a quien podían haber dado por muerto. Pero lo que más me reconforta es que el Comisario, ese traidor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}recibió su merecido{/d} y no enviará más desesperados a la muerte».
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier caso, les estoy agradecido a usted y a la Hermana Argenta por salvarme la vida. Espero poder recompensarles algún día por apiadarse de un muerto andante. Pero lo que más me reconforta es que el Comisario, ese traidor, recibió su merecido y no enviará más desesperados a la muerte».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Wie dem auch sei, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin Euch und Schwester Argenta dankbar, dass Ihr mir das Leben gerettet habt. Ich hoffe, dass ich mich eines Tages dafür revanchieren kann, dass Ihr Mitleid mit einem Todgeweihten hattet. Aber was mir am meisten das Herz wärmt, ist die Tatsache, dass dieser Verräter von Kommissar {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}seine gerechte Strafe bekommen hat{/d} und nie wieder verzweifelte Leute in den Tod schicken kann."
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: "Wie dem auch sei, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin Euch und Schwester Argenta dankbar, dass Ihr mir das Leben gerettet habt. Ich hoffe, dass ich mich eines Tages dafür revanchieren kann, dass Ihr Mitleid mit einem wandelnden Toten hattet. Aber was mir am meisten das Herz wärmt, ist die Tatsache, dass dieser Verräter von Kommissar seine gerechte Strafe bekommen hat. Und dass er nie wieder verzweifelte Leute in den Tod schicken kann."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, Votre Seigneurie, je vous suis reconnaissant, à vous et à sœur Argenta, d'avoir eu pitié d'un mort en sursis et de m'avoir sauvé la vie. J'espère pouvoir un jour rembourser ma dette. Mais ce qui me réchauffe le cœur par-dessus tout, c'est de savoir que le commissaire, ce traître, a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}eu ce qu'il méritait{/d} et n'enverra plus de pauvres âmes infortunées à l'abattoir. »
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, Votre Seigneurie, je vous suis reconnaissant, à vous et à sœur Argenta, d'avoir eu pitié d'un mort en sursis et de m'avoir sauvé la vie. J'espère pouvoir un jour rembourser ma dette. Mais ce qui me réchauffe le cœur par-dessus tout, c'est de savoir que le commissaire, ce traître, a eu ce qu'il méritait et n'enverra plus de pauvres âmes infortunées à l'abattoir. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, her hâlükârda Rahibe Argenta ile hayatımı kurtardığınız için müteşekkirim. Umarım bir gün ölüden hâllice bir adama merhamet etmenizin karşılığını verebilirim. Yüreğime en çok su serpense o hain Komiser'in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}hak ettiğini bulması{/d} ve artık biçare insanları ölümüne gönderemeyecek olması."
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead. What warms my heart the most, though, is that the Commissar, that traitor, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}got what he deserved{/d} and will not be sending any more desperate people to their deaths."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, her hâlükârda Rahibe Argenta ile hayatımı kurtardığınız için müteşekkirim. Umarım bir gün ölüden hâllice bir adama merhamet etmenizin karşılığını verebilirim. Yüreğime en çok su serpense o hain Komiser'in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarDead}hak ettiğini bulması{/d} ve tek bir biçare insanı daha ölümüne gönderemeyecek olması."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
